casebody.data:
MULTIPLE CLAIMANTS
v.
NCDHHS. No. 183A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Robert G. Hargett, Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for NCDHHS. Benjamin E. Baker, Jr., Montgomery, AL, Bruce A. Elmore, Jr., Asheville, C. Gary Triggs, Robert K. Denton, Lawrence D. McMahon, Jr., Morganton, William Hixson, Henry E. Teich, Scott M. Anderson, for Multiple Claimants.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of May 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (NCDHHS) shall have up to and including the 10th day of June 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
